snippet: An independent panel advised the camera maker to seek more than $1.2 billion from current and past executives over a cover-up that lasted more than a decade.
abstract: Olympus Corp is suing 19 current and former executives over their roles in a $1.7 billion cover-up of losses after an independent panel's report into management involvement in the fraud; suits seek over 90 billion yen ($1.2 billion) from executives.
lead_paragraph: An independent panel advised the camera maker to seek more than $1.2 billion from current and past executives over a cover-up that lasted more than a decade.
